meta.title: Golden Retriever Cost: Price, Monthly Expenses & Vet Bills
meta.description: How much does a Golden Retriever cost? Breakdown of puppy prices, monthly food costs, vet bills, and insurance premiums.

intro.short_hook: How much does a Golden Retriever cost? Breakdown of puppy prices, monthly food costs, vet bills, and insurance premiums.
intro.context: Expect to spend $1,500–$3,000 for a puppy and $150–$250 monthly for care.
intro.why_costs_can_spike: Golden Retrievers are prone to expensive health issues like cancer and hip dysplasia.

quick_answers.question: What is the key takeaway?
quick_answers.answer: This is a sample quick answer for validation purposes.

cost_breakdown.summary: Expect to spend $1,500–$3,000 for a puppy and $150–$250 monthly for care.

line_items.label: Puppy Price
line_items.notes: Varies by breeder reputation and location.

line_items.label: Health & Vet
line_items.notes: Flea/tick prevention and annual exam savings.

insurance_section.summary: Pays for itself with one major incident.
insurance_section.when_insurance_makes_sense: High risk of genetic health issues makes insurance a smart financial move.
insurance_section.when_you_might_skip_it: If you have significant savings set aside for emergencies.

saving_tips.summary: Ways to reduce expenses without compromising care.
